title: Neuro-Cell & Molecular
description: An overview of principles and techniques in cell and molecular neuroscience: neuron excitability, synaptic transmission, learning and memory to basic mechanisms of neurological diseases.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: NEUR 2001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or NEUR 2000 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or NEUR 2010 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
